item.title: How to make your machine learning model available as an API with the plumber package
item.description: The plumber package for R makes it easy to expose existing R code as a webservice via an API (https://www.rplumber.io/, Trestle Technology, LLC 2017). You take an existing R script and make it accessible with plumber by simply adding a few lines of comments.
